body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, merchant and farmer. Cumberland County native. Married to Mary Polly Oâ€™Banion Cloyd in 1828. Father of L. D. Cloyd, Thomas Cloyd, C. Cloyd, Sarah Cloyd, R. A. Cloyd, James Cloyd, John Cloyd, M. E. Cloyd, Missouri Cloyd, Lavega Cloyd, William Cloyd. Married to Victoria Williams Cloyd. Father of Eliza Cloyd, Taylor Cloyd, Lucetta Cloyd, Ritta Cloyd, Robert Cloyd. Merchant and farmer in Cumberland County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860.
